Arkatos.bugfix: Fixed an issue where you could duplicate the monarch's crown when summoning it.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Learning a spell from the spell tree will override that spell if it is present to assure it stays.
Rituos will have it spells removed correctly and will not remove arcyne eye or prestidigitation.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Unfix learn spell removal to fix spell tree visual bug.

CheffieGithub.code_imp: Issue reports are now uploaded to github via bot and do not require users to use github directly, it is still preferable to use github if possible.

Arkatos.qol: You can no longer cancel triumph buys of others.
Triumph buys now refund 100% of their cost.
Failed triumph buys will now automatically refund. Roll with no fear!

Arkatos.bugfix: Fixed an issue where printing press could not find all books or printed random books.

Deceiving meekness now falsifie the pitchness of your choice.(originally, High STR lowered your pitch.)
lessened the chance of a jumpscare popping up.

Arkatos.rscadd: Influences balancing, added number of medicators as a possible influence for Pestra.

Arkatos.bugfix: Influence modifier is now correctly applied to negative influences.
